answerText: Epicoene[10] This play, by the same author as Epicoene, centers around the performance of a puppet show. In it, Quarlous and Winwife are vying for the hand of Dame Purecraft.
heading: QUARK |2012 | 1 | 19 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this play is a bear baiter named Otter, who, along with La Foole and Daw, is among the group of people who annoy Morose after Morose's wedding to the title "Silent Woman." For 10 points each: [10] Name this drama in which it is revealed that Morose's bride is actually a boy in disguise after Morose bequeaths money to his scheming nephew Dauphine.
